hopobject.name: demo_readEDID
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_3) AppleWebKit/537.31 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/26.0.1410.65 Safari/537.31
hopobject.body:
Navigation
  • Menu contents

Demo: Read EDID

You can parse the "EDID data" output below using the web page edidreader.com.

Collected EDID data: 

var b = require('bonescript');
b.readTextFile('/proc/cmdline', printCmdline);
b.shell('xxd /sys/class/drm/card0/card0-HDMI-A-1/edid > /tmp/edid');
setTimeout(readEdid, 2000);
function readEdid() {
    b.readTextFile('/tmp/edid', printEdid);
}
function printCmdline(x) {
    console.log('Linux kernel command line:');
    if(x.err) console.log('Error: ' + x.err);
    console.log(x.data);
}
function printEdid(x) {
    console.log('EDID data:');
    if(x.err) console.log('Error: ' + x.err);
    var lines = x.data.split('\n');
    var mydata = [];
    for(var i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
        var y = lines[i].split(' ');
        for(var j = 1; j < y.length && j < 9; j++) {
            mydata.push('0x' + y[j].substr(0,2));
            mydata.push('0x' + y[j].substr(2,2));
        }
    }
    console.log(mydata);
}
